trans_title: 本先生的奇幻冒险 第一季
introduction: Mr Benn is the ordinary, bowler-hatted office worker who lives in the ordinary suburban street of Festive Road. However, when he tries on a costume in a mysterious costume shop, he steps out of the changing room into a different time and place, appropriate to his apparel. His adventures include him being an astronaut, a pirate and a Native American.本先生是一个平淡无奇的城市白领，有一天他发现了一个神秘的道具服装店，每当他走进这家店的试衣间试穿一件戏服的时候，就会走进一个和服装匹配的奇幻世界，开启一段冒险奇遇记。
chinese_title: 本先生的奇幻冒险 第一季
